All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Client
Client is the main client class for the networking and will connect to a Server
Client
The Servers client object to offload a bit from the server
ClientAcceptThread
The Thread that's resposible for allowing new Clients and doing an initial handshake
ExitPackage
Exit package containing information of closing/exiting the connection
FatalPackage
A Serializable that contains a fatal information
Headers
Headers are used for handshake conversation of the start when connection a Client and Server
Logger
Logger are used to give a more specified information and the class that sent it
MessagePackage
An example class that uses the Serializable interface
In this class we have a MessagePackage.message that is of the type String
Server
A standard example server setup
Server
The main class for the Server
